tsa 3p irr neutralizers.enriched_query:
1. **Enriched Procurement Query**:
- Seeking suppliers for "Tryptic Soy Agar (TSA) with 3-Part Irradiated (IRR) Neutralizers".
- Intended use: **Not specified** (please specify if for environmental monitoring, sterility testing, validation, etc.).
- Format/packaging: **Not specified** (please specify plate size, volume, or other format preferences if known).
- Quantity requirement: **Not specified**.
- Product should contain triple neutralizers (commonly lecithin, polysorbate 80, and sodium thiosulfate) and must be irradiated to achieve sterility assurance.
- Must be compliant with relevant pharmacopeial standards (e.g., USP, EP, JP) – **open, unless specified**.
- Certificate of Analysis (CoA) and sterility documentation preferred.
- Alternate names/synonyms: "Tryptic Soy Agar with Neutralizers", "Irradiated TSA 3N", "TSA 3-Component Neutralizing Agar", "TSA with Lecithin/Polysorbate/Sodium Thiosulfate", "TSA neutralizing media irradiated".
- Please provide catalog numbers and technical data sheets if available.

2. **Key Comparison Attributes**:
- **Sterilization Method** (gamma irradiation confirmation and certificate)
- **Type and concentration of neutralizers** (lecithin, polysorbate 80, sodium thiosulfate; exact formulation)
- **Regulatory compliance/certifications** (pharmacopeial conformity, GMP, CoA availability)
- **Packaging/format** (plates, bottles, tubes; size and quantity per pack)
- **Shelf life and storage conditions**

vendors.product_description: Ready-to-use contact plates (55 mm) of Tryptic Soy Agar with neutralizers (lecithin, polysorbate 80 (Tween®), sodium thiosulfate, L-histidine); gamma-irradiated and triple-wrapped; pack of 10 plates (10 plates/triple pack)
vendors.packaging_format: 55 mm contact plates, triple-wrapped; 10 plates per pack ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/GE/en/product/mm/146231#:~:text=packaging))
vendors.storage_condition: Protect from light; keep loosely closed and dry ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/GE/en/product/mm/146231#:~:text=protect%20from%20light%20,closed%20and%20dry))

vendors.product_description: Triple-wrapped sterile pack of Tryptic Soy Agar (55 mm plates) with neutralizers (lecithin, polysorbate 80, sodium thiosulfate, L-histidine) and a VHP indicator; 100 plates per pack (with 2D barcode)
